JALS Growing Home

JALS Growing Home is an innovative, phased construction model that allows Ugandan homeowners to start with a one-bedroom house and expand to two or three bedrooms as their needs grow.

Features

i) Affordable, Scalable, and Sustainable
The project integrates natural ventilation and daylight optimization to reduce energy costs. Starting at UGX 98M, homeowners can begin with a one-bedroom house and expand over time.

ii) Innovative Self-Sufficiency Features
Homeowners have the option to integrate:

a) Sustainable Water Solutions:
A hand-dug well to reduce reliance on external utilities.

b) Renewable Energy:
Solar power for an affordable and efficient energy source.

iii) Flexible Design & Financing
Built on 100ft x 50ft plots, the model supports incremental expansion while maintaining aesthetic appeal. We have partnered with Housing Finance Bank to provide tailored financing solutions, making homeownership more accessible. J.A Living Spaces is committed to innovative, budget-friendly, and sustainable housing solutions that grow with you. Start small. Expand smart. Live sustainably.
